contextId.information: "Perhaps Yahweh will turn from his anger ... God." (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]])
God uses this question to scold the people of Tyre, Sidon and Philistia. AT: "You have no right to be angry at me" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_rquestion]]).
contextId.quote: why are you angry at me
